channel.title: Compiler stopped working
channel.description: so for some reason my Compiler has just stopped working this is the code [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause[/code] i have in it and the only thing i downloded since it stopped working is BitComet

item.title: Compiler stopped working
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

ill let you use my compiler
here type this code inside your compiler

@echo off
title GolemXScape Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
color d
echo Updating client...
echo Finishing...
echo _________________________________________________________________
echo *****************************************************************
echo               successfully comipled!
echo _________________________________________________________________
echo Compiler Made By Owner GolemX
pause;
